definitions.text: incapable of or resistant to bending
examples: a table made of rigid plastic
a palace guardsman stiff as a poker

definitions.text: incapable of adapting or changing to meet circumstances
designating an airship or dirigible having a form maintained by a stiff unyielding frame or structure
fixed and unmoving; ; - Connor Cruise O'Brien
examples: with eyes set in a fixed glassy stare
his bearded face already has a set hollow look
